mapper.select: SELECT game_code, game_date, game_team_name_home, game_team_name_away FROM game WHERE game_date > current_date ORDER BY game_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket(game_title, pay_date, member_no, game_code, seat_id_one, seat_section_one, seat_price_one, seat_id_two, seat_section_two, seat_price_two, seat_id_three, seat_section_three, seat_price_three, seat_id_four, seat_section_four, seat_price_four) VALUES (#{gameTitle}, #{payDate}, #{memberNo}, #{gameCode}, #{seatIdOne}, #{seatSectionOne}, #{seatPriceOne}, #{seatIdTwo}, #{seatSectionTwo}, #{seatPriceTwo}, #{seatIdThree}, #{seatSectionThree}, #{seatPriceThree}, #{seatIdFour}, #{seatSectionFour}, #{seatPriceFour})
INSERT INTO seats (seat_id, section, lock_status, lock_time, reserved_by) VALUES (#{seatId}, #{section}, #{lockStatus}, #{lockTime}, #{reservedBy})
